title: 杜特爾特：以總統身份就馬尼拉人質事件正式道歉

replies.msg:
正在香港的菲律賓總統杜特爾特，就2010年馬尼拉人質事件，以總統身份正式向港人道歉。

菲律賓傳媒報道，杜特爾特與本港的菲律賓團體見面時表示，關注菲律賓就事件未有「正式致歉」。他說，以總統身份，發自內心深處正式道歉。他說，對事件感到遺憾，並保證不會再讓事件重演。

事發在2010年，時任總統貝尼尼奧阿基諾曾表明，不會為事件道歉和賠償。

http://news.rthk.hk/rthk/ch/component/k2/1390873-20180412.htm?spTabChangeable=0
仲以為過多100年都唔會道歉

Let me for the first time...... the Chinese government and the people of China have been waiting for this. There has been no official apology coming form the Philippines regarding that incident that happened in August 2010. May I address myself to the Chinese people who are here, who are with us, join us, from the bottom of my heart, as President of Republic of the Philippines, and on behalf of the people of the Philippines, may I apologise formally to you now. We are sorry that the incident happened, as humanly possible, I would like to guarantee that this will never happen again. I hope this would go along way to really assuage the feeling of the Chinese people and government.
So it's only right that lives were lost under our jurisdiction.
What is really needed is just to say we are really sorry, we apologise."
